I can't thank you enough for this, being home sick with nothing good to watch just got so much bettter... i'll seed for as long as possible

Most of the seeds are coming back saying that people's machines are refusing it so either people don't know how to seed properly or they don't have certain things turned on. Either way they should fix it so other people can seed when they finally finish their download!

Could someone please explain to me how 536 lines becomes 720P?  The DEFINITION of 720p is 720 horizontal lines delivered progressively (vs. interlaced), so WTF?  Just because the source says HD, it doesn't mean 720!
